name: 蔡一豪
objective:
本課程旨在介紹 Python 程式設計的基礎知識。課程涵蓋 Python 語言的基本概念、數據結構、函式與模組，學生將能夠掌握 Python 程式設計並能夠應用於解決實際問題。
This course aims to introduce the basic knowledge of Python programming. The course covers fundamental concepts of the Python language, data structures, functions, and modules. Students will be able to master Python programming and apply it to solve real-world problems.
schedule:
1. Course Introduction
2. Brief History and Applications of Python
3. Basic Syntax
4. Basic Operations with Numbers and Strings
5. Variables and Operators
6. If Statements
7. While Loops
8. For Loops
9. Advanced Loop Control: break, continue, else
10. Midterm Report
11. Introduction to Functions
12. Function Parameters in Detail
13. Importing and Using Modules
14. Importing and Using Modules
15. Designing Python Packages
16. Random and Statistics Modules
17. Final Report
18. Final Report

※ Course schedule and content are subject to adjustment based on students’ learning progress.
scorePolicy:
Midterm Report: 30%
Final Report: 40%
In-class Assignments, Quizzes, and Attendance/Participation: 30%

※ Evaluation items and grading weights are subject to adjustment based on students’ learning progress.
